&nbsp;前言&nbsp;2022年8月25日，我做了个新项目RPageSearch来实现静态站的全站搜索功能，并且也发了篇新博客《静态站实现全站搜索》。当时在文章的结尾我是这么说的：&nbsp;“说回主角，我把它在Github立了个项，放在Github@RavelloH/RPageSearch中，现在没有时间不会再去更新它，但是以后(也可能是很久以后)会陆续升级一下，加入模糊搜索等功能。”&nbsp;正好最近重制主题，为了契合新主题的风格以及性能优化正好也把RPageSearch升级了一下。现在它具有比以前丰富得多的功能，性能方面也极大的提升了。遂做篇新文章来作为新的使用文档。&nbsp;项目v2版本现已发布，Releases见下：&nbsp;Releases&nbsp;·&nbsp;RavelloH/RPageSearch&nbsp;更新内容&nbsp;性能优化，MB级数据索引速度小于100ms&nbsp;可搜索内容扩大，从之前的标题+内容升级为标题+内容+章节+标签+分类+外链等等&nbsp;更快的即时搜索&nbsp;搜索语法拓展，可使用正则表达式实现模糊搜索&nbsp;使用Web&nbsp;Worker异步运算，不会堵塞主进程&nbsp;自动持续构建升级，转入NodeJs框架&nbsp;可拓展的标准数据格式，索引文件及结果均使用Object格式存储&nbsp;可自定义的前端模板样式&nbsp;效果&nbsp;在我的博客中可直接试用此搜索功能，感受它的高性能。&nbsp;原理&nbsp;构建时运行search.js，这会对站点所有文章进行索引并生成一个索引文件search.json。&nbsp;在客户端使用时，浏览器会请求生成的search.json，并与Web&nbsp;Workersearch.worker.js建立连接。&nbsp;在搜索时，搜索词及索引数据将会被发送至Worker并处理，Worker返回一个JSON格式的搜索结果。&nbsp;之后，前端处理返回的结果并展示。&nbsp;使用&nbsp;此项目及下方所用到的所有文件/代码片段均位于RPageSearch仓库内。&nbsp;Github:RavelloH/RPageSearch&nbsp;初始化配置&nbsp;注意：你需要先根据自己的页面结构调整脚本&nbsp;配置目录结构&nbsp;例子：&nbsp;如果你的文章目录结构如下：&nbsp;......&nbsp;├──&nbsp;articles&nbsp;│&nbsp;├──&nbsp;20200816&nbsp;│&nbsp;│&nbsp;├──&nbsp;index.html&nbsp;│&nbsp;├──&nbsp;20210701&nbsp;│&nbsp;│&nbsp;└──&nbsp;index.html&nbsp;│&nbsp;├──&nbsp;20210705&nbsp;│&nbsp;│&nbsp;└──&nbsp;index.html&nbsp;│&nbsp;├──&nbsp;20210719&nbsp;│&nbsp;│&nbsp;└──&nbsp;index.html&nbsp;│&nbsp;├──&nbsp;20220206&nbsp;│&nbsp;│&nbsp;└──&nbsp;index.html&nbsp;......&nbsp;需要在search.js中这样配置：&nbsp;//&nbsp;配置区&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesFolder&nbsp;=&nbsp;"../articles/";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章根目录&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesFileName&nbsp;=&nbsp;"index.html";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文档文件名&nbsp;const&nbsp;savePath&nbsp;=&nbsp;"../assets/data/search.json";&nbsp;这将会匹配这样的内容：../articles/*/index.html&nbsp;RPageSearch默认会在articlesFolder中列出所有目录，并检测其中是否含有articlesFileName，如果有则进行解析。&nbsp;其中，savePath定义了生成数据的保存路径，后期会用到。&nbsp;配置页面结构&nbsp;例子：&nbsp;如果你的文章文档结构如下：&nbsp;<article>&nbsp;<div&nbsp;id="articles-header">&nbsp;<h2><a&nbsp;href="/articles/20221224/">HikvisionIP摄像头后台绕过</a></h2><p&nbsp;class="articles-info">&nbsp;<time>2022-12-24</time>&nbsp;•<span&nbsp;class="i_small&nbsp;ri:archive-line"></span><span&nbsp;class="class"><a>网络安全</a>/<a>技术</a></span>&nbsp;•<span&nbsp;class="i_small&nbsp;ri:t-box-line"></span>&nbsp;<span&nbsp;id="textLength">----字</span>&nbsp;•<span&nbsp;class="i_small&nbsp;ri:search-eye-line"></span>&nbsp;<span&nbsp;id="pageVisitors">---</span>&nbsp;</p>&nbsp;<p&nbsp;class="articles-tags">&nbsp;<span&nbsp;class="i_small&nbsp;ri:price-tag-3-line"></span><a>ATTACK</a><a>JSON</a><a>MONITOR</a>&nbsp;</p>&nbsp;<hr>&nbsp;</div>&nbsp;<div&nbsp;id="articles-body">&nbsp;<h3>标题</h3><p>&nbsp;正文内容&nbsp;</p>&nbsp;<br><br><h3>标题</h3><p>&nbsp;正文&nbsp;</p>&nbsp;<h3>标题</h3><p>&nbsp;正文&nbsp;</p>&nbsp;</div>&nbsp;<div&nbsp;id="articles-footer">&nbsp;略&nbsp;</div>&nbsp;</article>&nbsp;可以在search.js中这样配置：&nbsp;//&nbsp;选择器&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesName&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-header&nbsp;h2&nbsp;a";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章标题元素&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesUrl&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-header&nbsp;h2&nbsp;a";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章链接元素&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesTime&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-header&nbsp;.articles-info&nbsp;time";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章时间元素&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesClass&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-header&nbsp;.articles-info&nbsp;.class&nbsp;a";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章分类元素&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesTag&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-header&nbsp;.articles-tags&nbsp;a";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章标签元素&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesBody&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-body";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章正文元素&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesImages&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-body&nbsp;img";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章图片元素&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesLinks&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-body&nbsp;a";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章外链元素&nbsp;const&nbsp;articlesTitle&nbsp;=&nbsp;"#articles-body&nbsp;h2&nbsp;,&nbsp;#articles-body&nbsp;h3&nbsp;,&nbsp;articles-body&nbsp;h4&nbsp;,&nbsp;articles-body&nbsp;h5&nbsp;,&nbsp;articles-body&nbsp;h6";&nbsp;//&nbsp;文章小标题元素&nbsp;这里可以任意使用CSS选择器，参考如上。&nbsp;生成索引数据&nbsp;安装依赖并执行search.js&nbsp;npm&nbsp;install&nbsp;node&nbsp;search.js&nbsp;不出意外，用于保存结果的search.json会正常生成在之前定义的路径savePath中。&nbsp;此文件用于与search.worker.js通信，其格式一般不需要调整，为所有索引的对象，其中的一项格式如下：&nbsp;{&nbsp;"name":&nbsp;"Minecraft反转药水效果",&nbsp;"url":&nbsp;"/articles/20200816/",&nbsp;"time":&nbsp;"2020-08-16",&nbsp;"class":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"游戏"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"tag":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"minecraft",&nbsp;"json"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"title":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"原理",&nbsp;"效果",&nbsp;"命令"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"context":&nbsp;"文章内容，略"&nbsp;"img":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"/articles/20200816/show1.gif",&nbsp;"/articles/20200816/show2.gif",&nbsp;"/articles/20200816/show3.gif"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"links":&nbsp;[]&nbsp;}&nbsp;前端接入&nbsp;你需要在frontEnd.js中自定义以适应你的样式。详细的例子，可以参照我的博客或RTheme&nbsp;search.worker.js一般不需要调整。它会在搜索时返回以下结构的结果：&nbsp;[{&nbsp;"name":&nbsp;"论静态页中伪动态的实现",&nbsp;"url":&nbsp;"/articles/20220708/",&nbsp;"time":&nbsp;"2022-07-08",&nbsp;"class":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"技术",&nbsp;"设计"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"tag":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"javascript",&nbsp;"html",&nbsp;"python"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"title":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"前言",&nbsp;"效果",&nbsp;"实现方法",&nbsp;"页面自动构建"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"context":&nbsp;"文章内容，这里略"&nbsp;"img":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"/articles/20220708/show1.gif",&nbsp;"/articles/20220708/show2.png",&nbsp;"/articles/20220708/code3.png"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"links":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"?text=123&?name=aaa#锚点",&nbsp;"https://ravelloh.github.io/PSGameSpider/",&nbsp;"https://ravelloh.github.io/EverydayNews/",&nbsp;"https://github.com/RavelloH/PSGameSpider",&nbsp;"?text=123&?name=aaa#实现方法",&nbsp;"https://docs.github.com/cn/actions",&nbsp;"https://github.com/RavelloH/PSGameSpider",&nbsp;"https://github.com/RavelloH/EverydayNews"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"match":&nbsp;[&nbsp;[&nbsp;"context",&nbsp;25,&nbsp;118&nbsp;],&nbsp;[&nbsp;"links",&nbsp;1&nbsp;]&nbsp;],&nbsp;"matchTimes":&nbsp;25&nbsp;},&nbsp;{&nbsp;"name":&nbsp;"静态站实现全站搜索",&nbsp;"url":&nbsp;"/articles/20220825/",&nbsp;"time":&nbsp;"2022-08-25",&nbsp;"class":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"技术",&nbsp;"设计"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"tag":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"javascript",&nbsp;"json",&nbsp;"python"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"title":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"前言",&nbsp;"效果",&nbsp;"实现方式",&nbsp;"代码分析",&nbsp;"后言"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"context":&nbsp;"文章内容，这里略"&nbsp;"img":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"/articles/20220825/show1.jpg"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"links":&nbsp;[&nbsp;"/articles/",&nbsp;"https://github.com/ravelloh/ravelloh.github.io",&nbsp;"https://github.com/ravelloh/RPageSearch"&nbsp;],&nbsp;"match":&nbsp;[&nbsp;[&nbsp;"context",&nbsp;7,&nbsp;103&nbsp;],&nbsp;[&nbsp;"links",&nbsp;1&nbsp;]&nbsp;],&nbsp;"matchTimes":&nbsp;7&nbsp;}]&nbsp;返回的对象包含索引的所有内容，并已经按照相关度排序，且其匹配项会被包裹在<mark></mark>标签内。除此以外，还会包含一个特殊值match用于表示所有匹配的结果数据。&nbsp;match定义了一个结果列表，其每一项的第一项表示匹配的属性，第二项表示匹配的属性在所有属性中的排序。&nbsp;其中，context属性与其他属性稍微不同，它的第二项是匹配个数，第三项是第一次匹配的字符位置。&nbsp;match的最后一项是matchTimes，表示匹配次数。如果含有标题匹配，这个值会是999999以确保其在结果中置顶。&nbsp;因为是使用worker通讯，你可以参照frontEnd.js中的search函数配置你的结果展示。&nbsp;在示例中，搜索的核心实现如下：&nbsp;function&nbsp;getSearchData()&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(typeof&nbsp;searchData&nbsp;==&nbsp;"undefined")&nbsp;{&nbsp;return&nbsp;new&nbsp;Promise((resolve,&nbsp;reject)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;fetch(dataFilePath,&nbsp;{})&nbsp;.then((response)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;response.json())&nbsp;.then((data)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;searchData&nbsp;=&nbsp;data;&nbsp;resolve(data);&nbsp;});&nbsp;}).catch((err)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;throw&nbsp;err;&nbsp;});&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;return&nbsp;Promise.resolve(searchData);&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;function&nbsp;search(keyword)&nbsp;{&nbsp;let&nbsp;start&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;Date().getTime();&nbsp;if&nbsp;(keyword&nbsp;==&nbsp;""&nbsp;||&nbsp;keyword&nbsp;==&nbsp;".")&nbsp;{&nbsp;return&nbsp;false;&nbsp;}&nbsp;searchWord&nbsp;=&nbsp;HTMLDecode(keyword);&nbsp;getSearchData().then((data)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(typeof&nbsp;searchWorker&nbsp;==&nbsp;"undefined")&nbsp;{&nbsp;searchWorker&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;Worker(workerPath);&nbsp;}&nbsp;searchWorker.onmessage&nbsp;=&nbsp;(result)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;let&nbsp;end&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;Date().getTime();&nbsp;let&nbsp;data&nbsp;=&nbsp;result.data;&nbsp;console.log(`查询操作用时${end&nbsp;-&nbsp;start}MS`);&nbsp;if&nbsp;(data.length&nbsp;==&nbsp;0)&nbsp;{&nbsp;console.log("未找到有关选项");&nbsp;return&nbsp;false;&nbsp;}&nbsp;let&nbsp;resultHTML&nbsp;=&nbsp;"";&nbsp;data.forEach((e,&nbsp;index)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;resultHTML&nbsp;+=&nbsp;structureSearchResult(e);&nbsp;});&nbsp;console.log(resultHTML);&nbsp;//&nbsp;结果输出&nbsp;};&nbsp;searchWorker.postMessage([data,&nbsp;searchWord]);&nbsp;});&nbsp;}&nbsp;这实际上是RTheme中相关组件的精简版，它使用getSearchData()方式返回一个Promise，并在存在本地缓存是直接返回或在本地无缓存时请求数据并异步返回。&nbsp;最主要的功能实现在函数search()的定义内，它会转义搜索词并与Worker通信，将返回结果的每一项传递给新函数structureSearchResult()以构建标准HTML输出。示例中的输出格式如下:&nbsp;function&nbsp;structureSearchResult(result)&nbsp;{&nbsp;let&nbsp;cla&nbsp;=&nbsp;"";&nbsp;let&nbsp;tag&nbsp;=&nbsp;"";&nbsp;let&nbsp;match&nbsp;=&nbsp;"";&nbsp;let&nbsp;matchItem,&nbsp;matchNum,&nbsp;matchContext,&nbsp;matchTag,&nbsp;matchClass,&nbsp;matchTitle,&nbsp;matchLinks;&nbsp;let&nbsp;strLinks&nbsp;=&nbsp;"";&nbsp;result.match.forEach((e)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(typeof&nbsp;e&nbsp;==&nbsp;"object")&nbsp;{&nbsp;matchItem&nbsp;=&nbsp;e[0];&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;matchItem&nbsp;=&nbsp;e;&nbsp;}&nbsp;switch&nbsp;(matchItem)&nbsp;{&nbsp;case&nbsp;"name":&nbsp;match&nbsp;+=&nbsp;"标题&nbsp;/&nbsp;";&nbsp;break;&nbsp;case&nbsp;"context":&nbsp;matchNum&nbsp;=&nbsp;e;&nbsp;match&nbsp;+=&nbsp;`内容(${e[1]}次)&nbsp;/&nbsp;`;&nbsp;break;&nbsp;case&nbsp;"title":&nbsp;match&nbsp;+=&nbsp;"章节&nbsp;/&nbsp;";&nbsp;matchTitle&nbsp;=&nbsp;e;&nbsp;break;&nbsp;case&nbsp;"tag":&nbsp;match&nbsp;+=&nbsp;"标签&nbsp;/&nbsp;";&nbsp;matchTag&nbsp;=&nbsp;e;&nbsp;break;&nbsp;case&nbsp;"class":&nbsp;match&nbsp;+=&nbsp;"分类&nbsp;/&nbsp;";&nbsp;matchClass&nbsp;=&nbsp;e;&nbsp;break;&nbsp;case&nbsp;"links":&nbsp;match&nbsp;+=&nbsp;"外链&nbsp;/&nbsp;";&nbsp;matchLinks&nbsp;=&nbsp;e;&nbsp;break;&nbsp;}&nbsp;});&nbsp;result.class.forEach((e,&nbsp;index)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(typeof&nbsp;matchClass&nbsp;!==&nbsp;"undefined"&nbsp;&&nbsp;&&nbsp;matchClass[1]&nbsp;==&nbsp;index)&nbsp;{&nbsp;cla&nbsp;+=&nbsp;`<a&nbsp;href="#/classification/${e}"&nbsp;class='active'>${e}</a>/`;&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;cla&nbsp;+=&nbsp;`<a&nbsp;href="#/classification/${e}">${e}</a>/`;&nbsp;}&nbsp;});&nbsp;cla&nbsp;=&nbsp;cla.substring(0,&nbsp;cla.length&nbsp;-&nbsp;1);&nbsp;result.tag.forEach((e,&nbsp;index)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(typeof&nbsp;matchTag&nbsp;!==&nbsp;"undefined"&nbsp;&&nbsp;&&nbsp;matchTag[1]&nbsp;==&nbsp;index)&nbsp;{&nbsp;tag&nbsp;+=&nbsp;`<a&nbsp;href="#/tag/${e}"&nbsp;class='active'>${e}</a>`;&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;tag&nbsp;+=&nbsp;`<a&nbsp;href="#/tag/${e}">${e}</a>`;&nbsp;}&nbsp;});&nbsp;match&nbsp;=&nbsp;match.substring(0,&nbsp;match.length&nbsp;-&nbsp;3);&nbsp;if&nbsp;(typeof&nbsp;matchNum&nbsp;==&nbsp;"undefined"&nbsp;||&nbsp;matchNum[2]&nbsp;<&nbsp;10)&nbsp;{&nbsp;matchContext&nbsp;=&nbsp;result.context.substring(0,&nbsp;150);&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;matchContext&nbsp;=&nbsp;result.context.substring(&nbsp;matchNum[2]&nbsp;-&nbsp;10,&nbsp;matchNum[2]&nbsp;+&nbsp;140,&nbsp;);&nbsp;}&nbsp;result.links.forEach((e,&nbsp;index)&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(typeof&nbsp;matchLinks&nbsp;!==&nbsp;"undefined"&nbsp;&&nbsp;&&nbsp;matchLinks[1]&nbsp;==&nbsp;index)&nbsp;{&nbsp;strLinks&nbsp;=&nbsp;`<a&nbsp;class='search-result-links&nbsp;one-line'&nbsp;href='${e}'><span&nbsp;class='i_small&nbsp;ri:link'></span>&nbsp;${e}</a>`;&nbsp;}&nbsp;});&nbsp;return&nbsp;`<div&nbsp;class="loaded&nbsp;listprogram"><article><span&nbsp;class="article-name"><h4><a&nbsp;href="${result.url}">${result.name}</a></h4></span><p&nbsp;class="articles-info"><span&nbsp;class='search-result-tags'>${match}</span><time>${result.time}</time>&nbsp;•&nbsp;<span&nbsp;class="i_small&nbsp;ri:archive-line"></span><span&nbsp;class="class">${cla}</span><div&nbsp;class='search-result-context'><span&nbsp;class='i_small&nbsp;ri:file-list-2-line'></span>&nbsp;...${matchContext}</div>${strLinks}</p><p&nbsp;class="articles-tags">${tag}</p></article><hr></div>`&nbsp;}&nbsp;你可以据此使用result.url&nbsp;result.name&nbsp;match&nbsp;result.time&nbsp;cla&nbsp;matchContext&nbsp;strLinks&nbsp;tag等结果字符串自定义你的输出模板。其中，matchContext会返回结果前后共150字符的内容，你可以通过修改CSS实现其样式的优化，或直接参考RTheme&nbsp;持续构建&nbsp;在初始化成功后，你可以使用github&nbsp;Workflow在有更改时自动构建。&nbsp;添加一个.github/workflow/search.xml，示例如下：&nbsp;name:&nbsp;RPageSearch&nbsp;on:&nbsp;push:&nbsp;paths:&nbsp;-&nbsp;'articles/**'&nbsp;workflow_dispatch:&nbsp;permissions:&nbsp;contents:&nbsp;write&nbsp;pages:&nbsp;write&nbsp;id-token:&nbsp;write&nbsp;jobs:&nbsp;build:&nbsp;runs-on:&nbsp;ubuntu-latest&nbsp;#运行环境&nbsp;steps:&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;Checkout&nbsp;uses:&nbsp;actions/checkout@v2&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Git&nbsp;set'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;git&nbsp;init&nbsp;git&nbsp;pull&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Set&nbsp;up&nbsp;nodejs'&nbsp;uses:&nbsp;actions/setup-node@v3&nbsp;with:&nbsp;node-version:&nbsp;'latest'&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Install&nbsp;requirements'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;npm&nbsp;install&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Working'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;node&nbsp;search.js&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;Commit&nbsp;files&nbsp;continue-on-error:&nbsp;True&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;git&nbsp;diff&nbsp;git&nbsp;config&nbsp;--local&nbsp;user.email&nbsp;"dr_hamilton@foxmail.com"&nbsp;git&nbsp;config&nbsp;--local&nbsp;user.name&nbsp;"Ravello-H"&nbsp;git&nbsp;add&nbsp;-A&nbsp;git&nbsp;commit&nbsp;-m&nbsp;"[RPageSearch]`date&nbsp;'+%Y-%m-%d&nbsp;%H:%M:%S'`"&nbsp;||&nbsp;exit&nbsp;git&nbsp;status&nbsp;git&nbsp;push&nbsp;-f&nbsp;进阶&nbsp;因为能提供索引文件，你可以据此生成其他文件。参照以下项目：&nbsp;Github:RavelloH/local-feed-generation&nbsp;依赖&nbsp;Github:Cheeriojs/cheerio&nbsp;

innerHTML&nbsp;=&nbsp;"";&nbsp;numVirgule&nbsp;=&nbsp;0&nbsp;var&nbsp;virgulegenerate&nbsp;=&nbsp;setInterval(&nbsp;function()&nbsp;{&nbsp;//&nbsp;字符划分&nbsp;if&nbsp;(escape(contextArr[numVirgule]).indexOf("%u")&nbsp;<&nbsp;0)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(contextArr[numVirgule]&nbsp;==&nbsp;'&nbsp;')&nbsp;{&nbsp;target.innerHTML&nbsp;+=&nbsp;'&nbsp;'&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;target.innerHTML&nbsp;+=&nbsp;'/'&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;target.innerHTML&nbsp;+=&nbsp;'//'&nbsp;}&nbsp;numVirgule&nbsp;+=&nbsp;1&nbsp;if&nbsp;(numVirgule&nbsp;>&nbsp;context.length)&nbsp;{&nbsp;clearInterval(virgulegenerate);&nbsp;target.innerHTML&nbsp;=&nbsp;target.innerHTML.slice(0,&nbsp;target.innerHTML.length-1)&nbsp;setTimeout(function()&nbsp;{&nbsp;textIn()},&nbsp;100)&nbsp;}&nbsp;},&nbsp;1000/speed)&nbsp;//&nbsp;文字进入&nbsp;numIn&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;function&nbsp;textIn()&nbsp;{&nbsp;originText&nbsp;=&nbsp;target.innerHTML;&nbsp;var&nbsp;virgulereplace&nbsp;=&nbsp;setInterval(&nbsp;function()&nbsp;{&nbsp;numIn&nbsp;+=&nbsp;1&nbsp;if&nbsp;(numIn&nbsp;>=&nbsp;contextArr.length)&nbsp;{&nbsp;clearInterval(virgulereplace)&nbsp;textwrite()&nbsp;}&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;=&nbsp;''&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;=&nbsp;0&nbsp;for&nbsp;(i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;numIn;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(escape(contextArr[i]).indexOf("%u")&nbsp;<&nbsp;0)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(contextArr[i]&nbsp;==&nbsp;'&nbsp;')&nbsp;{&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;+=&nbsp;'&nbsp;'&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;+=&nbsp;1&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;//单字符&nbsp;var&nbsp;rand&nbsp;=&nbsp;Math.floor(Math.random()&nbsp;*&nbsp;randArrMin.length);&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;+=&nbsp;randArrMin[rand]&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;+=&nbsp;1&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;//&nbsp;双字符&nbsp;var&nbsp;rand&nbsp;=&nbsp;Math.floor(Math.random()&nbsp;*&nbsp;randArr.length);&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;+=&nbsp;randArr[rand]&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;+=&nbsp;2&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;target.innerHTML&nbsp;=&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;+&nbsp;originText.slice(numCharacter,&nbsp;originText.length)&nbsp;},&nbsp;2000/speed)&nbsp;//&nbsp;原始文字写入&nbsp;numWrite&nbsp;=&nbsp;0&nbsp;function&nbsp;textwrite()&nbsp;{&nbsp;originText&nbsp;=&nbsp;target.innerHTML;&nbsp;var&nbsp;virgulewrite&nbsp;=&nbsp;setInterval(&nbsp;function()&nbsp;{&nbsp;numWrite&nbsp;+=&nbsp;1&nbsp;if&nbsp;(numWrite&nbsp;>=&nbsp;contextArr.length)&nbsp;{&nbsp;clearInterval(virgulewrite)&nbsp;}&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;=&nbsp;''&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;=&nbsp;0&nbsp;for&nbsp;(i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;numIn;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(escape(contextArr[i]).indexOf("%u")&nbsp;<&nbsp;0)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(contextArr[i]&nbsp;==&nbsp;'&nbsp;')&nbsp;{&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;+=&nbsp;'&nbsp;'&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;+=&nbsp;1&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;//单字符&nbsp;var&nbsp;rand&nbsp;=&nbsp;Math.floor(Math.random()&nbsp;*&nbsp;randArrMin.length);&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;+=&nbsp;randArrMin[rand]&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;+=&nbsp;1&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;//&nbsp;双字符&nbsp;var&nbsp;rand&nbsp;=&nbsp;Math.floor(Math.random()&nbsp;*&nbsp;randArr.length);&nbsp;cacheText&nbsp;+=&nbsp;randArr[rand]&nbsp;numCharacter&nbsp;+=&nbsp;2&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;target.innerHTML&nbsp;=&nbsp;context.slice(0,&nbsp;numWrite)&nbsp;+&nbsp;cacheText.slice(numWrite,&nbsp;cacheText.length)&nbsp;+&nbsp;originText.slice(numCharacter,&nbsp;originText.length)&nbsp;},&nbsp;2000/speed)&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;用以上任意一种方法，获取到JS即可。接下来就是如何使用，也十分方便：&nbsp;virgule(target,context,speed)&nbsp;//target&nbsp;context必填，speed可选填，默认100&nbsp;//example:&nbsp;virgule(document.getElementById('jumping'),&nbsp;'Place&nbsp;the&nbsp;text&nbsp;you&nbsp;want&nbsp;as&nbsp;the&nbsp;result&nbsp;here',100)&nbsp;//对文档中一个id为jumping的元素使用virgule效果，目标文字是"Place&nbsp;the&nbsp;text&nbsp;you&nbsp;want&nbsp;as&nbsp;the&nbsp;result&nbsp;here"，速度为100&nbsp;需要注意的是，此项目需搭配等宽字体使用，如自带的Courier&nbsp;New、Terminal等，或者自己引入其他等宽字体。&nbsp;这里推荐Microsoft&nbsp;Yahei&nbsp;Mono和SF&nbsp;Mono&nbsp;SC。&nbsp;实现方法&nbsp;注:下方行数表示以上Js代码所处行数。&nbsp;4-5：定义了两个列表randArrMin以及randArr，前者用于一个英文字符宽的字符的替换，后者用于一个中文字符宽的替换。&nbsp;7：定义了virgule的主函数，默认参数中targetcontext必填，speed选填，默认100。&nbsp;8-12：将context中的内容转换到contextArr中储存。&nbsp;14-15：重置目标&nbsp;16-36：创建延迟循环virgulegenerate，间隔1000/speed毫秒。&nbsp;18-28：判断中英文，中文插入两个/，英文插入一个/，空格插入空格。&nbsp;29-34：判断何时结束斜杠的插入动作，延迟100ms唤起textIn()&nbsp;39-40：重置变量&nbsp;41-109：textIn()主函数，用于将生成的斜杠替换为context文字。&nbsp;43：创建定时器virgulereplace，间隔2000/speed毫秒&nbsp;46-49：终止器，用于在此环节结束后呼出下一个操作函数textWrite()&nbsp;52-69：二次递归循环，用于按上一级循环进行量将对应数量斜杠替换为随机文字，同样分双字符、单字符、空格三种情况。&nbsp;70：对应写入，切分随机字符组与斜杠字符组，保证总长度不变。&nbsp;16-108：textIn()函数下的二级函数textWrite()，用于在将target中所有字符替换为随机字符后，继续将随机字符替换为context()&nbsp;79-83：在所有过程结束后终止定时器&nbsp;86-103：同52-69，将contextArr中内容逐个添加进去。&nbsp;104：重组字符串，酱三个列表中的内容整合写入target中。&nbsp;关键分析&nbsp;其实整个过程中最复杂的是三个插入过程的顺序。这简单来说，分为以下三个阶段：&nbsp;1.用斜杠覆盖文本。&nbsp;2.逐渐将斜杠替换为随机文字。这一过程中，每将一个斜杠组替换一个新字符，就会重新将它前面的随机字符再随机化。&nbsp;3.用target中的文字替换随机文字。这一过程大体与2相反，没将一个随机字符替换为目标字符，就会刷新其后的随机字符。&nbsp;以上三个过程顺次进行，每个过程完成后唤起下一个过程。如果还不理解，可以在#效果章节的在线体验中，选择较低的速度运行，以理解这三个过程。&nbsp;后言&nbsp;上述就是virgule.js现有的功能介绍和使用方法，顺带着也写了大体的实现方法。&nbsp;本来打算把virgule效果应用给整个博客的，但碍于实在找不到什么地方再去添加，先鸽了。&nbsp;

&nbsp;注：本文中的项目已更新重构，前往新的文章以查看更快速高效的v2.0版本&nbsp;前言&nbsp;全站搜索这一功能我想加入到我的博客中不是一年两年的事了。但因自己现在弃用Hexo转而自己做博客，这两年搜索这个功能就一直未能实现。&nbsp;最近自己偶然有新想法，就给实现了。效果还不错，现在搭配Github&nbsp;Actions使用，可以实现新文章自动索引，实现了自动化。&nbsp;效果&nbsp;搜索示例&nbsp;要想充分体验，还是自己去试试的好。转到Articles索引页&nbsp;实现方式&nbsp;数据生成&nbsp;要想在静态页搜索，就要自己创建索引。这里使用python来创建一个JSON，存储全站文章信息：&nbsp;#&nbsp;-*-&nbsp;coding:&nbsp;utf-8&nbsp;-*-&nbsp;##&nbsp;使用有问题请到github.com/ravelloh/RPageSearch提ISSUE&nbsp;###&nbsp;Author:&nbsp;RavelloH&nbsp;####&nbsp;LICENCE:&nbsp;MIT&nbsp;#####&nbsp;RPageSearch&nbsp;import&nbsp;os&nbsp;from&nbsp;bs4&nbsp;import&nbsp;BeautifulSoup&nbsp;##&nbsp;设置目标&nbsp;target&nbsp;=&nbsp;'./articles/'&nbsp;#&nbsp;目录位置&nbsp;layers&nbsp;=&nbsp;1&nbsp;#&nbsp;遍历层数&nbsp;targettype&nbsp;=&nbsp;'html'&nbsp;#&nbsp;文件后缀名(只支持html)&nbsp;main_structure_head='{"articles":['&nbsp;main_structure_end=']}'&nbsp;inner_structure_1='{"title":"'&nbsp;inner_structure_2='","path":"'&nbsp;inner_structure_3='","time":"'&nbsp;inner_structure_4='","text":"'&nbsp;inner_structure_5='"}'&nbsp;##&nbsp;打开目标目录&nbsp;targetfile&nbsp;=&nbsp;[]&nbsp;for&nbsp;i&nbsp;in&nbsp;os.listdir(target):&nbsp;if&nbsp;'.'&nbsp;not&nbsp;in&nbsp;i:&nbsp;for&nbsp;k&nbsp;in&nbsp;os.listdir(target&nbsp;+i):&nbsp;if&nbsp;targettype&nbsp;in&nbsp;k:&nbsp;targetfile.append(target&nbsp;+&nbsp;i&nbsp;+&nbsp;'/'&nbsp;+&nbsp;k)&nbsp;##&nbsp;按时间顺序排序&nbsp;targetfilenum&nbsp;=&nbsp;[]&nbsp;for&nbsp;i&nbsp;in&nbsp;targetfile:&nbsp;targetfilenum.append(i[11:19])&nbsp;targetfilenum.sort(reverse=True)&nbsp;targetfile=[]&nbsp;for&nbsp;i&nbsp;in&nbsp;targetfilenum:&nbsp;targetfile.append('./articles/'+str(i)+'/index.html')&nbsp;##&nbsp;解析重构目标文件&nbsp;inner_structure_cache=[]&nbsp;inner_structure_text=''&nbsp;for&nbsp;i&nbsp;in&nbsp;targetfile:&nbsp;inner_structure_text&nbsp;=&nbsp;''&nbsp;with&nbsp;open(i,'r')&nbsp;as&nbsp;f:&nbsp;filecontent&nbsp;=&nbsp;BeautifulSoup(f.read(),'html.parser')&nbsp;textlist&nbsp;=&nbsp;filecontent.find_all(name='p')&nbsp;title&nbsp;=&nbsp;filecontent.find_all(name ticles.length)&nbsp;{&nbsp;for&nbsp;(i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;resulttitlecache.length;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;for&nbsp;(j&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;j&nbsp;<&nbsp;obj.articles.length;&nbsp;j++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(obj.articles[j]['title']&nbsp;==&nbsp;resulttitlecache[i])&nbsp;{&nbsp;titlesearchresult&nbsp;=&nbsp;'<h4><a&nbsp;href="'+obj.articles[j]["path"]+'"&nbsp;class="resulttitle">'+obj.articles[j]['title'].replace(new&nbsp;RegExp(input.value,&nbsp;'g'),&nbsp;'<mark>'+input.value+'</mark>')+'</a></h4><em>-标题匹配</em><p&nbsp;class="showbox">'+obj.articles[j]['text'].substring(0,&nbsp;100)+'</p>'&nbsp;resultstr&nbsp;=&nbsp;titlesearchresult&nbsp;+&nbsp;'<hr>'&nbsp;+&nbsp;resultstr&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;result.innerHTML&nbsp;=&nbsp;'<i>"'+input.value+'"</i><hr>'+resultstr;&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;//&nbsp;正文搜索&nbsp;var&nbsp;resulttextcache&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;Array()&nbsp;for&nbsp;(i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;obj.articles.length;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(obj.articles[i]['text'].includes(input.value)&nbsp;==&nbsp;true)&nbsp;{&nbsp;resulttextcache.unshift(obj.articles[i]['text'])&nbsp;resultcount++;&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;//&nbsp;正文搜索结果计数&nbsp;var&nbsp;targetname&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;Array()&nbsp;var&nbsp;targetscore&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;Array()&nbsp;if&nbsp;(resulttextcache.length&nbsp;!==&nbsp;0&nbsp;&&&nbsp;input.value&nbsp;!==&nbsp;'')&nbsp;{&nbsp;for&nbsp;(i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;resulttextcache.length;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;for&nbsp;(j&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;j&nbsp;<&nbsp;obj.articles.length;&nbsp;j++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(obj.articles[j]['text']&nbsp;==&nbsp;resulttextcache[i])&nbsp;{&nbsp;targetname.unshift(obj.articles[j]['title'])&nbsp;targetscore.unshift(obj.articles[j]['text'].match(RegExp(input.value,&nbsp;'gim')).length)&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;//排序相关选项&nbsp;var&nbsp;targetscorecache&nbsp;=&nbsp;targetscore.concat([]);&nbsp;var&nbsp;resultfortext&nbsp;=&nbsp;'';&nbsp;var&nbsp;textsearchresult&nbsp;=&nbsp;''&nbsp;targetscorecache.sort(function(a,&nbsp;b)&nbsp;{&nbsp;return&nbsp;b-a&nbsp;})&nbsp;for&nbsp;(i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;targetscorecache.length;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;for&nbsp;(j&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;j&nbsp;<&nbsp;targetscore.length;&nbsp;j++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(targetscorecache[i]&nbsp;==&nbsp;targetscore[j])&nbsp;{&nbsp;console.log('文章排序:'+targetname[j])&nbsp;for&nbsp;(k&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;k&nbsp;<&nbsp;obj.articles.length;&nbsp;k++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(obj.articles[k]['title']&nbsp;==&nbsp;targetname[j])&nbsp;{&nbsp;//&nbsp;确认选区&nbsp;textorder&nbsp;=&nbsp;obj.articles[k]['text'].indexOf(input.value)&nbsp;-15;&nbsp;while&nbsp;(textorder&nbsp;<&nbsp;0)&nbsp;{&nbsp;textorder++&nbsp;}&nbsp;resultfortext&nbsp;=&nbsp;'<h4><a&nbsp;href="'+obj.articles[k]["path"]+'"&nbsp;class="resulttitle">'+obj.articles[k]['title']+'</a></h4><em>-'+targetscorecache[i]+'个结果</em><p&nbsp;class="showbox">...'+obj.articles[k]['text'].substring(textorder,&nbsp;textorder+100).replace(new&nbsp;RegExp(input.value,&nbsp;'g'),&nbsp;'<mark>'+input.value+'</mark>')+'</p>'&nbsp;textsearchresult&nbsp;=&nbsp;textsearchresult&nbsp;+&nbsp;'<hr>'&nbsp;+&nbsp;resultfortext;&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;//&nbsp;无效结果安排&nbsp;if&nbsp;(resultcount&nbsp;!==&nbsp;obj.articles.length)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(resultcount&nbsp;==&nbsp;0)&nbsp;{&nbsp;result.innerHTML&nbsp;=&nbsp;'<i>"'+input.value+'"</i><hr><p&nbsp;align="center">没有找到结果</p>'&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;//&nbsp;整合&nbsp;result.innerHTML&nbsp;=&nbsp;result.innerHTML.substring(0,&nbsp;result.innerHTML.length-4)+textsearchresult.substring(0,&nbsp;textsearchresult.length-4)+'<hr><a&nbsp;href="https://github.com/ravelloh/RPageSearch"&nbsp;class="tr">Search&nbsp;powered&nbsp;by&nbsp;RavelloH\'s&nbsp;RPageSearch</a>'&nbsp;}&nbsp;当然，上述代码比复杂，接下来我会分步来说。&nbsp;代码分析&nbsp;前3行没什么好说的，找到对应的元素，方便后期处理。&nbsp;第5行从生成的json内获取数据，之后从第六行开始是主函数，搭配html表单使用，效果是当输入时实时搜索。&nbsp;7-10行判断输入框是否为空，若空替换为默认提示词。&nbsp;12-21行遍历json中存储的标题，查找是否有相关字词，若有，为resultcount+1，并将完整标题加入到列表resulttitlecache中&nbsp;23-34行用于展示搜索结果，条件是resultcount不为0（要能找得到结果才继续，节省运算量）且不为json中文章总数（若输入一些字符后全部删除，默认输入了""，所有文章都会有反馈。），里面是两个遍历组合，第一个遍历resulttitlecache中的有结果的标题，第二个遍历总数据，搜索到契合后即可确认总数据的路径、时间、正文、标题信息，然后整合存储到resultstr中。这样因为我们在python生成数据时就是按时间顺序排列的，在这里遍历也是时间最近的结果优先。同时，第一层遍历将搜索到的resultstr中的信息整合到html中展示结果的result元素(一个id为resultlist的div)中。这里也用js替换高亮了信息里面的关键字，会给匹配的字符添加到一个mark标签内（默认黄底白字，可以用css改，比如我的博客就改成了蓝底另外加了个圆角），另外也会截取正文前100字符用于展示，但是因为字符宽度不一显示起来不整齐，要解决可以用css限制行数，css我会放在文章下面。&nbsp;36-43行与12-21行相似，将搜索匹配的结果存储在resulttextcache中，不在赘述。&nbsp;45-57行也类似于23-34行，为两个嵌套的遍历，不同的是这个不写入，而是记录搜索结果中含关键词的总数，方便后续排序。具体做法是创建两个列表targetname和targetscore，targetname记录resulttextcache中的正文内容，targetscore记录对应含关键词的数量。这两个是一一对应的关系，比如targetname的第二项所含的关键词总数就等于targetscore第二项记录的数字。&nbsp;59-84行花了大功夫排序，首先创建一个targetscore的备份targetscorecache，但是要深拷贝*关乎js数组知识，若只是简单的var&nbsp;a=b则a&nbsp;b共享存储位置，换句话说就是a变b也变，对一维数组可以简单的使用a=b.concat([])来解决，之后以数组sort方式排序，此时targetscorecache为降序排列，targetscore保持原顺序不变，之后套三层遍历（应该还能继续优化，但我懒得做了，又不是不能用，性能影响也不大）前两层嵌套和之前搜索匹配的23-34、45-57相同，不过这次匹配的是targetscorecache与targetscore，之后再从总数据到json种找到正文匹配的文章，获取到对应的path、title、time和text，然后是类似于23-34到写入过程，这里值得注意有三点，一是这次高亮的是text中的结果，2是这里也会用上作为排序依据的targetscore，在标题下方展示相应的结果数（见最上方用于展示的图片），三是这里生成的html代码不直接写入而是存储到变量textsearchresult中，方便最后整合的时候删掉多余的hr标签。&nbsp;86-91给上面接底，如果啥也没找到就替换为相应的文本。&nbsp;最后92-93用来整合、合并标题搜索与正文搜索的内容，顺便加上个powered&nbsp;by的后缀，这里你也可以替换为你自己的文字，或者干脆连前面的hr标签也一起删掉，但我还是希望能留下个注释标明出处。&nbsp;上述就是js进行本地运算的过程，至于若想达到和我博客相同的效果，css是必不可少的，这里简单罗列一下css及相关的js。&nbsp;<!--&nbsp;CSS&nbsp;-->&nbsp;form.searchbox&nbsp;input[type=text]&nbsp;{&nbsp;color:&nbsp;#c6c9ce;&nbsp;height:&nbsp;30px;&nbsp;padding:&nbsp;5px;&nbsp;font-size:&nbsp;12px;&nbsp;float:&nbsp;left;&nbsp;width:&nbsp;80%;&nbsp;background:&nbsp;#000000;&nbsp;border:&nbsp;1px&nbsp;solid&nbsp;#1e1e1e;&nbsp;border-radius:&nbsp;10px&nbsp;0px&nbsp;0px&nbsp;10px;&nbsp;}&nbsp;form.searchbox&nbsp;button&nbsp;{&nbsp;height:&nbsp;30px;&nbsp;float:&nbsp;left;&nbsp;width:&nbsp;20%;&nbsp;padding:&nbsp;5px;&nbsp;background:&nbsp;#1e1e1e;&nbsp;color:&nbsp;white;&nbsp;font-size:&nbsp;12px;&nbsp;border:&nbsp;none;&nbsp;cursor:&nbsp;pointer;&nbsp;border:&nbsp;1px&nbsp;solid&nbsp;#1e1e1e;&nbsp;border-radius:&nbsp;0px&nbsp;10px&nbsp;10px&nbsp;0px;&nbsp;text-align:&nbsp;center;&nbsp;line-height:&nbsp;10px;&nbsp;margin:&nbsp;auto;&nbsp;}&nbsp;form.searchbox&nbsp;button:hover&nbsp;{&nbsp;background:&nbsp;#0b7dda;&nbsp;transition:&nbsp;background&nbsp;0.2s;&nbsp;}&nbsp;form.searchbox::after&nbsp;{&nbsp;content:&nbsp;"";&nbsp;clear:&nbsp;both;&nbsp;display:&nbsp;table;&nbsp;}&nbsp;.resultlist&nbsp;{&nbsp;top:&nbsp;-20px;&nbsp;height:&nbsp;0;&nbsp;width:&nbsp;100%;&nbsp;transition:&nbsp;height&nbsp;0.4s;&nbsp;background:&nbsp;#000000;&nbsp;color:&nbsp;#c6c9ce;&nbsp;}&nbsp;.resultlist#active&nbsp;{&nbsp;border-radius:&nbsp;10px;&nbsp;border:&nbsp;1px&nbsp;solid&nbsp;#1e1e1e;&nbsp;height:&nbsp;40%;&nbsp;}&nbsp;.resultlist&nbsp;*&nbsp;{&nbsp;margin:&nbsp;2px;&nbsp;}&nbsp;.resulttitle&nbsp;{&nbsp;color:&nbsp;#ffffff;&nbsp;font-size:&nbsp;1em;&nbsp;}&nbsp;#info&nbsp;{&nbsp;opacity:&nbsp;1;&nbsp;transition:&nbsp;opacity&nbsp;0.4s;&nbsp;}&nbsp;#hidden&nbsp;{&nbsp;opacity:&nbsp;0;&nbsp;}&nbsp;.fc&nbsp;{&nbsp;text-align:&nbsp;center;&nbsp;}&nbsp;.title&nbsp;{&nbsp;max-width:&nbsp;45%;&nbsp;}&nbsp;.tr&nbsp;{&nbsp;text-align:&nbsp;right&nbsp;}&nbsp;mark&nbsp;{&nbsp;background-color:&nbsp;#0b7dda;&nbsp;border-radius:&nbsp;4px;&nbsp;color:&nbsp;#fff;&nbsp;margin:&nbsp;0;&nbsp;}&nbsp;.showbox&nbsp;{&nbsp;display:&nbsp;-webkit-box;&nbsp;-webkit-box-orient:&nbsp;vertical;&nbsp;-webkit-line-clamp:&nbsp;2;&nbsp;overflow:&nbsp;hidden;&nbsp;margin:&nbsp;2px&nbsp;!important&nbsp;}&nbsp;//&nbsp;JS&nbsp;添加到刚才所有JS的最上方&nbsp;function&nbsp;check()&nbsp;{&nbsp;return&nbsp;false;&nbsp;}&nbsp;function&nbsp;maxfor(arr)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;len&nbsp;=&nbsp;arr.length;&nbsp;var&nbsp;max&nbsp;=&nbsp;-Infinity;&nbsp;while&nbsp;(len--)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(arr[len]&nbsp;>&nbsp;max)&nbsp;{&nbsp;max&nbsp;=&nbsp;arr[len];&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;return&nbsp;max;&nbsp;}&nbsp;//&nbsp;下面的和刚才的代码有部分重复，替换就行&nbsp;let&nbsp;input&nbsp;=&nbsp;document.querySelector("input[type='text']");&nbsp;let&nbsp;result&nbsp;=&nbsp;document.getElementById('resultlist')&nbsp;let&nbsp;infos&nbsp;=&nbsp;document.getElementById('info')&nbsp;let&nbsp;button&nbsp;=&nbsp;document.getElementById('searchbutton')&nbsp;input.addEventListener("focus",&nbsp;e&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;result.style.height&nbsp;=&nbsp;'40%'&nbsp;result.style.overflow&nbsp;=&nbsp;'auto'&nbsp;result.style.padding&nbsp;=&nbsp;'3px'&nbsp;infos.id&nbsp;=&nbsp;'hidden'&nbsp;})&nbsp;input.addEventListener("blur",&nbsp;e&nbsp;=>&nbsp;{&nbsp;result.style.height&nbsp;=&nbsp;'0'&nbsp;result.style.overflow&nbsp;=&nbsp;'hidden'&nbsp;result.style.padding&nbsp;=&nbsp;'0'&nbsp;infos.id&nbsp;=&nbsp;'info'&nbsp;})&nbsp;//&nbsp;下方应为obj的定义&nbsp;后言&nbsp;上述就是目前这个版本搜索的实现，理论上来说这个和前面一篇文章一样，内容都是关于伪动态的，因为搜索这个功能到我写这篇文章为止，都是先存数据库，然后在搜索时拿去数据库比对，之后返回结果，像我这样把搜索过程全搬到用户端的估计全互联网我还是第一人。不过这样也有利有弊，最大的利是节省了服务器，而弊端就是搜索速度依靠用户端设备算力，另外就是在内容太多时需要先将json下载到本地才能搜索（这是必要的，但是可以通过预加载等方式提前这个过程加快）&nbsp;做了这几篇文章，可以简单归纳伪动态：用其他脚本处理整合数据，前端用js处理。这里整合的载体是json，前面的EverydayNews载体是固定的文件夹结构，PSGameSpider则是混合，将数据直接写入定时更新生成的html的js部分数组里，读取则是靠固定文件夹结构。&nbsp;说回主角，我把它在Github立了个项，放在Github@RavelloH/RPageSearch中，现在没有时间不会再去更新它，但是以后(也可能是很久以后)会陆续升级一下，加入模糊搜索等功能。&nbsp;

//删除相邻的?&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg2&nbsp;=&nbsp;/\?{2,}/;&nbsp;var&nbsp;result2&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg2.exec(local2);&nbsp;if&nbsp;(result2&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;local3&nbsp;=&nbsp;local2.replace(/\?{2,}/,&nbsp;"?");&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;local3&nbsp;=&nbsp;local2;&nbsp;}&nbsp;//在最后加入一个?,方便截取&nbsp;var&nbsp;local4&nbsp;=&nbsp;local3&nbsp;+&nbsp;"?";&nbsp;//以?为分割符，循环遍历截取每一个参数并存储在数组中&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg3&nbsp;=&nbsp;/\?/;&nbsp;var&nbsp;result3&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg3.exec(local4);&nbsp;var&nbsp;arr&nbsp;=&nbsp;[];&nbsp;while&nbsp;(result3&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;local5&nbsp;=&nbsp;local4.substring(0,&nbsp;local4.indexOf("?"));&nbsp;arr.push(local5);&nbsp;local4&nbsp;=&nbsp;local4.substring(local4.indexOf("?")&nbsp;+&nbsp;1);&nbsp;result3&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg3.exec(local4);&nbsp;}&nbsp;//删除arr中的空元素&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg4&nbsp;=&nbsp;/^\s*$/;&nbsp;for&nbsp;(var&nbsp;i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;arr.length;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(reg4.exec(arr[i])&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;arr.splice(i,&nbsp;1);&nbsp;i--;&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;//遍历arr数组，并输出=前面的值与=后面的值&nbsp;for&nbsp;(var&nbsp;i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;arr.length;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg5&nbsp;=&nbsp;/=/;&nbsp;var&nbsp;result5&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg5.exec(arr[i]);&nbsp;if&nbsp;(result5&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;local6&nbsp;=&nbsp;arr[i].substring(0,&nbsp;arr[i].indexOf("="));&nbsp;var&nbsp;local7&nbsp;=&nbsp;arr[i].substring(arr[i].indexOf("=")&nbsp;+&nbsp;1);&nbsp;alert("参数"&nbsp;+&nbsp;local6&nbsp;+&nbsp;"的值为"&nbsp;+&nbsp;local7);&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;alert("没有参数");&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;//&nbsp;JavaScript&nbsp;//判断有没有"？"&nbsp;var&nbsp;local&nbsp;=&nbsp;window.location.search;&nbsp;if&nbsp;(local.substring(0,&nbsp;1)&nbsp;==&nbsp;'?')&nbsp;{&nbsp;//如果只有一个参数，那么直接弹出提示框&nbsp;if&nbsp;(local.substring(1).indexOf('&')&nbsp;==&nbsp;-1)&nbsp;{&nbsp;alert(local.substring(1));&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;//遍历替换所有&为?&nbsp;var&nbsp;local&nbsp;=&nbsp;window.location.search;&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg&nbsp;=&nbsp;/&/g;&nbsp;var&nbsp;result&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg.exec(local);&nbsp;if&nbsp;(result&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;local2&nbsp;=&nbsp;local.replace(reg,&nbsp;"?");&nbsp;}&nbsp;//删除相邻的?&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg2&nbsp;=&nbsp;/\?{2,}/;&nbsp;var&nbsp;result2&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg2.exec(local2);&nbsp;if&nbsp;(result2&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;local3&nbsp;=&nbsp;local2.replace(/\?{2,}/,&nbsp;"?");&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;local3&nbsp;=&nbsp;local2;&nbsp;//在最后加入一个?,方便截取&nbsp;var&nbsp;local4&nbsp;=&nbsp;local3&nbsp;+&nbsp;"?";&nbsp;console.log(local4);&nbsp;//以?为分割符，循环遍历截取每一个参数并存储在数组中&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg3&nbsp;=&nbsp;/\?/;&nbsp;var&nbsp;result3&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg3.exec(local4);&nbsp;var&nbsp;arr&nbsp;=&nbsp;[];&nbsp;while&nbsp;(result3&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;local5&nbsp;=&nbsp;local4.substring(0,&nbsp;local4.indexOf("?"));&nbsp;arr.push(local5);&nbsp;local4&nbsp;=&nbsp;local4.substring(local4.indexOf("?")&nbsp;+&nbsp;1);&nbsp;result3&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg3.exec(local4);&nbsp;}&nbsp;//删除arr中的空元素&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg4&nbsp;=&nbsp;/^\s*$/;&nbsp;for&nbsp;(var&nbsp;i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;arr.length;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;if&nbsp;(reg4.exec(arr[i])&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;arr.splice(i,&nbsp;1);&nbsp;i--;&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;//遍历arr数组，并输出=前面的值与=后面的值&nbsp;for&nbsp;(var&nbsp;i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;<&nbsp;arr.length;&nbsp;i++)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;reg5&nbsp;=&nbsp;/=/;&nbsp;var&nbsp;result5&nbsp;=&nbsp;reg5.exec(arr[i]);&nbsp;if&nbsp;(result5&nbsp;!=&nbsp;null)&nbsp;{&nbsp;var&nbsp;local6&nbsp;=&nbsp;arr[i].substring(0,&nbsp;arr[i].indexOf("="));&nbsp;var&nbsp;local7&nbsp;=&nbsp;arr[i].substring(arr[i].indexOf("=")&nbsp;+&nbsp;1);&nbsp;alert("参数"&nbsp;+&nbsp;local6&nbsp;+&nbsp;"的值为"&nbsp;+&nbsp;local7);&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;else&nbsp;{&nbsp;alert("没有参数");&nbsp;}&nbsp;>>运行<<&nbsp;页面自动构建&nbsp;当然，自动构建代码需要平台支持，这就不可避免的需要用到服务器。&nbsp;但是在本地无服务器的情况下，也可以上云，比如Github的Actions以及其他类似的服务。&nbsp;下面以Github&nbsp;Actions为例，演示如何使用Github&nbsp;Actions来自动构建页面：&nbsp;Github&nbsp;Actions&nbsp;简而言之，Github&nbsp;Actions就是一个云端的持续集成服务器。想要使用Github，只需要将相应代码传至Github仓库，在其中配置Actions即可。&nbsp;Actions的配置也很简单，只需在仓库内新建.github/workflows/main.yml文件即可。&nbsp;在此yml文件中，可以设置触发方式（如定时、每次提交、每次修改），以及触发条件（如提交的文件、提交的分支）。&nbsp;另外要执行的代码内容，依选择的平台的命令行格式来执行即可。比如要执行一Python脚本，可以在yml文件中写：&nbsp;jobs:&nbsp;build:&nbsp;runs-on:&nbsp;ubuntu-latest&nbsp;#设置运行环境&nbsp;steps:&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;Checkout&nbsp;uses:&nbsp;actions/checkout@v2&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Git&nbsp;set'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;git&nbsp;init&nbsp;git&nbsp;pull&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Set&nbsp;up&nbsp;Python'&nbsp;uses:&nbsp;actions/setup-python@v1&nbsp;with:&nbsp;python-version:&nbsp;3.7&nbsp;#v3&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Install&nbsp;requirements'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;pip&nbsp;install&nbsp;wget&nbsp;pip&nbsp;install&nbsp;bs4&nbsp;pip&nbsp;install&nbsp;urllib3&nbsp;#安装依赖&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Working'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;python&nbsp;update.py&nbsp;#运行主程序&nbsp;其余有关Actions的内容不再赘述，详见Github&nbsp;Actions&nbsp;Docs。&nbsp;使用Github&nbsp;Actions&nbsp;因为Github&nbsp;Actions是一个云端的持续集成服务器，所以可以在Github上配置Actions，然后在Github上提交代码，就可以自动构建页面。&nbsp;但这并不能达到自动构建页面的目的。想要自动部署，目前有两种方式：&nbsp;1.&nbsp;Github&nbsp;Actions&nbsp;+&nbsp;爬虫&nbsp;这个方法能实现全自动的内容抓取、分析、部署。下面以Python为例，讲讲大致的过程：&nbsp;首先需要明确要爬取的内容类型，如图片、文字、视频等。针对这些，如果网站需要展示相应的内容，那么就有使用原内容\下载至Github后展示两种思路。&nbsp;展示原内容的，即爬虫只爬取资源链接（或文字），然后写入页面；&nbsp;下载至Github，即爬虫爬取链接后下载内容，并使用Git将下载的内容提交至仓库，然后使用GithubPages展示。&nbsp;下载至Github的爬虫&nbsp;前者适合于网站的内容比较简单的，后者适合于网站的内容比较复杂的，并且前者不能存档资源，后者可以存档并备份资源&nbsp;如只是简单的复制内容，如爬取相应网站的css、js、html等并部署到自身以绕过封锁，或者是类似于新闻等的信息展示，那么可以使用第一种方式；&nbsp;如果在网站中需要存档资源方便查询，或者是源网站为非静态导致链接更换频繁，那么可以使用第二种方式。&nbsp;不过两者都有一定的局限性，例如前者不下载资源可能在网站结构改变或者动态站内容更新时，无法自动更新，而后者可能会导致资源冗余等问题。&nbsp;所以最好的方法是两者结合，并以不同资源类型而分情况使用。&nbsp;比如下载图像、文件等资源，并将相应文字资源直接写入html，然后配套修改链接即可。&nbsp;例我的项目为Github:RavelloH/PSGameSpider，其中包含了一个爬虫，用于爬取游戏资源。&nbsp;此项目的Github&nbsp;Actions配置如下：&nbsp;#&nbsp;YAML&nbsp;name:&nbsp;update&nbsp;on:&nbsp;schedule:&nbsp;-&nbsp;cron:&nbsp;'30&nbsp;5/12&nbsp;*&nbsp;*&nbsp;*'&nbsp;#每日更新&nbsp;watch:&nbsp;types:&nbsp;[started]&nbsp;workflow_dispatch:&nbsp;jobs:&nbsp;build:&nbsp;runs-on:&nbsp;ubuntu-latest&nbsp;#运行环境&nbsp;steps:&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;Checkout&nbsp;uses:&nbsp;actions/checkout@v2&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Git&nbsp;set'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;git&nbsp;init&nbsp;git&nbsp;pull&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Set&nbsp;up&nbsp;Python'&nbsp;uses:&nbsp;actions/setup-python@v1&nbsp;with:&nbsp;python-version:&nbsp;3.7&nbsp;#v3&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Install&nbsp;requirements'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;pip&nbsp;install&nbsp;wget&nbsp;pip&nbsp;install&nbsp;bs4&nbsp;pip&nbsp;install&nbsp;urllib3&nbsp;#安装依赖&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Working'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;python&nbsp;update.py&nbsp;#运行主程序&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'Page'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;python&nbsp;webpage.py&nbsp;#运行主程序&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'EnglishWorking'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;python&nbsp;en-update.py&nbsp;#运行主程序&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;'EnPage'&nbsp;run:&nbsp;python&nbsp;en-webpage.py&nbsp;#运行主程序&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;TOC&nbsp;uses:&nbsp;technote-space/toc-generator@v4&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;Record&nbsp;time&nbsp;run:&nbsp;echo&nbsp;`date`&nbsp;>&nbsp;date.log&nbsp;-&nbsp;name:&nbsp;Commit&nbsp;files&nbsp;run:&nbsp;|&nbsp;git&nbsp;diff&nbsp;git&nbsp;config&nbsp;--local&nbsp;user.email&nbsp;"hyh20060327@qq.com"&nbsp;git&nbsp;config&nbsp;--local&nbsp;user.name&nbsp;"RavelloH"&nbsp;git&nbsp;add&nbsp;-A&nbsp;git&nbsp;commit&nbsp;-m&nbsp;"`date&nbsp;'+%Y-%m-%d&nbsp;%H:%M:%S'`"&nbsp;||&nbsp;exit&nbsp;#动态提交信息&nbsp;git&nbsp;status&nbsp;git&nbsp;push&nbsp;-f&nbsp;env:&nbsp;GITHUB_TOKEN:&nbsp;${{&nbsp;secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN&nbsp;}}&nbsp;上述内容的逻辑是定时\STAR时激活爬虫，先下载资源，后通过python中的os.listdir()获取本地文件信息，后通过f.write()写入到HTML中。&nbsp;另外，也可以使用另一种方法:&nbsp;爬虫爬取到资源后，前端通过JavaScript将固定命名的资源文件引入，这样也能实现资源的动态更新。&nbsp;不过这对资源形式的要求较高，要求每天只能有固定数（或者换句话说，资源的数目是可预判的）的资源类型。&nbsp;使用这种方法的项目详见EverydayNews&nbsp;前端JS代码实现&nbsp;API&nbsp;+&nbsp;前端即时渲染&nbsp;这部分没什么好说的，看具体API返回的格式就行。&nbsp;返回text的就直接&nbsp;document.write()*外联拖慢加载速度或者.innerHTML()写入即可；&nbsp;返回json的就需要使用JSON.parse()解析，然后再写入即可。（当然要是格式稳定，也可以切分字符串）&nbsp;返回图片的也可以直接img引入即可，但是要注意图片的格式，要是png的话，要加上data:image/png;base64,。&nbsp;这部分最难的是找API，使用起来也很方便，看具体文档就行。&nbsp;

context: &nbsp;注:&nbsp;此文章中涉及的部分博客功能已在RThemeV3中作出调整，可能已无参考价值&nbsp;前言&nbsp;因为自己最近在忙这个博客的建设，所以自己就想给这个blog做一个切换页面时的过渡。可在网上却都没什么符合这blog主题的，于是自己动手丰衣足食，自己就做了现在的这种效果。&nbsp;效果&nbsp;效果如此blog中的切换效果，即：&nbsp;进入新页面时，除顶栏及底栏外的其余文字部分从屏幕左侧飞入，&nbsp;离开此页面时，除顶栏及底栏外的其余文字部分从屏幕左侧飞出。&nbsp;实现方式&nbsp;考虑到需要有对进入\离开页面的检测，这里需要用到JavaScript。对样式的调整，我选择了使用CSS动画。&nbsp;这样还有个优点：因为需要让动画结束后元素停留在结束位置，所以先使用动画，将元素从left:-xxxpx移动到left:0px即可。&nbsp;而对于离开页面，则需要使用window.onbeforeunload参数检测是否离开页面，然后触发动画。&nbsp;触发动画的方式，这里采用的是通过JS改变HTML内容的属性id，配合CSS选择器实现。&nbsp;值得注意的是，因为网络原因可能会导致一个页面的加载时间变长，这时若离开页面的动画播放完毕则会重新回到原位置。&nbsp;要解决这个问题，最好的办法是在css动画属性中加入"animation-fill-mode:&nbsp;forwards;",让动画结束时元素停在结束位置&nbsp;代码&nbsp;-&nbsp;-&nbsp;-&nbsp;CSS：&nbsp;Javascript:&nbsp;HTML&nbsp;文字版&nbsp;CSS：&nbsp;.text&nbsp;{&nbsp;position:&nbsp;relative;&nbsp;animation-name:&nbsp;startloading;&nbsp;animation-duration:&nbsp;1s;&nbsp;}&nbsp;@keyframes&nbsp;startloading&nbsp;{&nbsp;0%&nbsp;{&nbsp;left:&nbsp;-2000px&nbsp;}&nbsp;100%&nbsp;{&nbsp;left:&nbsp;0px;&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;.text#active&nbsp;{&nbsp;position:&nbsp;relative;&nbsp;animation-name:&nbsp;endloading;&nbsp;animation-duration:&nbsp;1s;&nbsp;color:&nbsp;#111111;&nbsp;animation-fill-mode:&nbsp;forwards;&nbsp;}&nbsp;@keyframes&nbsp;endloading&nbsp;{&nbsp;0%&nbsp;{&nbsp;left:&nbsp;0px&nbsp;}&nbsp;100%&nbsp;{&nbsp;left:&nbsp;-2000px;&nbsp;}&nbsp;}&nbsp;JS：&nbsp;window.onbeforeunload&nbsp;=&nbsp;function&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;{&nbsp;document.getElementById("text").id&nbsp;=&nbsp;"active";&nbsp;}&nbsp;HTML：&nbsp;<div&nbsp;class="text&nbsp;title"&nbsp;id="text">&nbsp;文字内容&nbsp;</div>&nbsp;
